content: @BWPanda - I"m asking you, because this seems like something you might have tried (or succeeded) in doing. Do you know how to export a list of issues from GITHUB. I'm just looking to export the title, issue number, and maybe path. Have you tried this before.
Right now, I'm interested in Backdropcms.org issue queue. I want a csv file or something I can import into a spreadsheet.
Hmm, no, I don't recall doing anything like that before...

@StPaulTim This might help: https://webapps.stackexchange.com/questions/45258/export-print-list-of-github-repo-issues

Export/Print list of GitHub repo issues
The repository that I am looking at has a great number of issues that I would like to read but it's not manageable while scrolling in GitHub interace. Is there an option to export or print a full l...

FYI - I just successfully exported a CSV file of all the issues in the BackdropCMS.org issue queue using - https://github.com/gavinr/github-csv-tools

gavinr/github-csv-tools
Import and export GitHub issues via CSV. Contribute to gavinr/github-csv-tools development by creating an account on GitHub.

If anyone is interested: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10i9htXRGxUdrwAFvamWQQvKM4zRs4Ok5sny_YOfSMwI/edit#gid=542457761

backdropcms.org issue queue
backdrop-issues number,title,state,labels,milestone,user,assignee,assignees,created_at,updated_at,closed_at,body 722,ApisCP auto-installer for Backdrop CMS,open,stpaultim,2020-10-30T02:10:17Z,2020-10-30T02:10:17Z,Opened by @domaingood (https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4722) Ap...
I put "view" access only. I think you should be able to clone or copy the contents if you want to play with it.

I've added a new TAB that contains the core backdrop issue queue. I'm not sure if this is useful, but I thought that either @BWPanda or @klonos might find it interesting to play with. Anyone else is welcome to copy it and experiment with it.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10i9htXRGxUdrwAFvamWQQvKM4zRs4Ok5sny_YOfSMwI/edit#gid=1575257541
